member.name: T:ExpertPdf.PDFSplit.PdfDocumentOptions
member.summary: This class encapsulates the options to control the PDF document redering process. The PDFSplitManager class define a reference to an object of this type

member.name: P:ExpertPdf.PDFSplit.PdfDocumentOptions.PdfCompressionLevel
member.summary: This property controls the compression level of the rendered PDF document

member.name: P:ExpertPdf.PDFSplit.Internal.PDFSplitter.LicenseKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the license key

member.name: T:ExpertPdf.PDFSplit.PDFCompressionLevel
member.summary: The rendered PDF compression level

member.name: F:ExpertPdf.PDFSplit.PDFCompressionLevel.AboveNormal
member.summary: Better compression but takes more time to compress

member.name: F:ExpertPdf.PDFSplit.PDFCompressionLevel.BelowNormal
member.summary: Something middle between normal and BestSpeed compressions

member.name: F:ExpertPdf.PDFSplit.PDFCompressionLevel.Best
member.summary: Use the best compression but takes more time to compress

member.name: F:ExpertPdf.PDFSplit.PDFCompressionLevel.BestSpeed
member.summary: The compression speed is high but the compression percentage is low

member.name: F:ExpertPdf.PDFSplit.PDFCompressionLevel.NoCompression
member.summary: Does not do any compression

member.name: F:ExpertPdf.PDFSplit.PDFCompressionLevel.Normal
member.summary: Use normal compression, a balance between compression speed and resulted size

member.name: T:ExpertPdf.PDFSplit.PDFSplitManager
member.summary: The PDF split manager allows you to split a PDF file or extract a range a pages from the PDF document

member.name: M:ExpertPdf.PDFSplit.PDFSplitManager.#ctor
member.summary: Merge using default PDF document options

member.name: M:ExpertPdf.PDFSplit.PDFSplitManager.#ctor(ExpertPdf.PDFSplit.PdfDocumentOptions)
member.summary: Merge using the specified PDF document options

member.name: M:ExpertPdf.PDFSplit.PDFSplitManager.ExtractPagesFromMemoryToMemory(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Extracts specified number of pages from the specified source PDF document starting from the specified page number and creates a new PDF document containing the extracted pages
member.param: The source PDF document as an array of bytes
The source PDF document page number from where to start extracting pages
The number of pages to extract
member.returns: The memory representation of the resulted PDF document

member.name: M:ExpertPdf.PDFSplit.PDFSplitManager.ExtractPagesFromMemoryToMemory(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Extracts 'repeatCount' times the specified number of pages from the specified source PDF document starting from the specified page number and creates a new PDF document for each set of extracted pages. Each set of extracted pages has 'splitPageCount' pages.
member.param: The source PDF document as an array of bytes
The source PDF document page number from where to start extracting pages
The number of pages to extract
Indicates how many documents of splitPageCount pages to create
member.returns: The memory representation of the resulted array of PDF documents

member.name: M:ExpertPdf.PDFSplit.PDFSplitManager.ExtractPagesFromMemoryToMemory(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method is similar to ExtractPagesFromMemoryToMemory with 'repeatCount' parameter but instead of exctracting a specified number of chunks, the chunks are extracted until the end of the document is reached when the 'repeatToEnd' parameter is true
member.param: The source PDF document as an array of bytes
The source PDF document page number from where to start extracting pages
The number of pages to extract
When true this parameter indicates to split the PDF document to the end
member.returns: The memory representation of the resulted array of PDF documents

member.name: M:ExpertPdf.PDFSplit.PDFSplitManager.ExtractPagesFromFileToMemory(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Extracts specified number of pages from the specified source PDF document starting from the specified page number and creates a new PDF document containing the extracted pages
member.param: The full path of source PDF file
The source PDF document page number from where to start extracting pages
The number of pages to extract
member.returns: The memory representation of the resulted PDF document

member.name: M:ExpertPdf.PDFSplit.PDFSplitManager.ExtractPagesFromFileToMemory(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Extracts 'repeatCount' times 'splitPageCount' number of pages from the source PDF document starting from the specified page number and creates a new PDF document for each set of extracted pages. Each set of extracted pages has 'splitPageCount' pages.
member.param: The full path of source PDF file
The source PDF document page number from where to start extracting pages
The number of pages to extract
Indicates how many documents of splitPageCount pages to create
member.returns: The memory representation of the resulted array of PDF documents

member.name: M:ExpertPdf.PDFSplit.PDFSplitManager.ExtractPagesFromFileToMemory(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method is similar to the ExtractPagesFromFileToMemory version with 'repeatCount' but instead of extracting a specified number of chunks, the chunks are extracted until the end of the document is reached when the 'repeatToEnd' parameter is true
member.param: The full path of source PDF file
The source PDF document page number from where to start extracting pages
The number of pages to extract
When true this parameter indicates to split the PDF document to the end
member.returns: The memory representation of the resulted array of PDF documents

member.name: M:ExpertPdf.PDFSplit.PDFSplitManager.ExtractPagesFromMemoryToFile(System.Byte[],System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Extracts specified number of pages from the specified source PDF document starting from the specified page number and creates a new PDF document containing the extracted pages
member.param: The source PDF document as an array of bytes
The full path of destination PDF file
The source PDF document page number from where to start extracting pages
The number of pages to extract

member.name: M:ExpertPdf.PDFSplit.PDFSplitManager.ExtractPagesFromMemoryToFile(System.Byte[],System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Extracts 'repeatCount' times the specified number of pages from the specified source PDF document starting from the specified page number and creates a new PDF document for each set of extracted pages. Each set of extracted pages has 'splitPageCount' pages. Each resulted PDF document is saved in the file specified by 'destPDFFilePath' concatenated with the chunk index
member.param: The source PDF document as an array of bytes
The full path of destination PDF file
The source PDF document page number from where to start extracting pages
The number of pages to extract
Indicates how many documents of splitPageCount pages to create

member.name: M:ExpertPdf.PDFSplit.PDFSplitManager.ExtractPagesFromMemoryToFile(System.Byte[],System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method is similar to ExtractPagesFromMemoryToMemory with 'repeatCount' parameter but instead of exctracting a specified number of chunks, the chunks are extracted until the end of the document is reached when the 'repeatToEnd' parameter is true
member.param: The source PDF document as an array of bytes
The full path of destination PDF file
The source PDF document page number from where to start extracting pages
The number of pages to extract
When true this parameter indicates to split the PDF document to the end

member.name: M:ExpertPdf.PDFSplit.PDFSplitManager.ExtractPagesFromFileToFile(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Extracts specified number of pages from the specified source PDF document starting from the specified page number and creates a new PDF document containing the extracted pages
member.param: The full path of source PDF file
The full path of destination PDF file
The source PDF document page number from where to start extracting pages
The number of pages to extract

member.name: M:ExpertPdf.PDFSplit.PDFSplitManager.ExtractPagesFromFileToFile(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Extracts 'repeatCount' times 'splitPageCount' number of pages from the source PDF document starting from the specified page number and creates a new PDF document for each set of extracted pages. Each set of extracted pages has 'splitPageCount' pages. Each resulted PDF document is saved in the file specified by 'destPDFFilePath' concatenated with the chunk index
member.param: The full path of source PDF file
The full path of destination PDF file
The source PDF document page number from where to start extracting pages
The number of pages to extract
Indicates how many documents of splitPageCount pages to create

member.name: M:ExpertPdf.PDFSplit.PDFSplitManager.ExtractPagesFromFileToFile(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method is similar to the ExtractPagesFromFileToMemory version with 'repeatCount' but instead of extracting a specified number of chunks, the chunks are extracted until the end of the document is reached when the 'repeatToEnd' parameter is true.
member.param: The full path of source PDF file
The full path of destination PDF file
The source PDF document page number from where to start extracting pages
The number of pages to extract
When true this parameter indicates to split the PDF document to the end
